defaultPageSize.description: The default number of articles per page

hideOnSinglePage.description: Whether to hide the pagination when there is only one page
hideOnSinglePage.description_zh: 只有一页时是否隐藏分页器

:itemRender.description: A structure for customizing page numbers that can be used to optimize SEO
:itemRender.description_zh: 用于自定义页码的结构，可用于优化 SEO

:pageSizeOptions.description: Specifies how many bars can be displayed on each page
:pageSizeOptions.description_zh: 指定每页可以显示多少条

responsive.description: When size is not specified, the size is automatically adjusted according to the width of the screen
responsive.description_zh: 当 size 未指定时，根据屏幕宽度自动调整尺寸

showLessItems.description: Whether or not to display less page content
showLessItems.description_zh: 是否显示较少页面内容

showQuickJumper.description: Is it possible to quickly jump to a page?
showQuickJumper.description_zh: 是否可以快速跳转至某页

showSizeChanger.description: Whether to display the 'pageSize' switcher, which defaults to true when 'total' is greater than 50
showSizeChanger.description_zh: 是否展示 `pageSize` 切换器，当 `total` 大于 50 时默认为 true

:showTotal.description: Used to display the total amount of data and the current data order
:showTotal.description_zh: 用于显示数据总量和当前数据顺序

simple.description: When the property is added, it is displayed as simple pagination
simple.description_zh: 当添加该属性时，显示为简单分页

size.description: When it is "small", it is a small pagination

events.name: change
events.description: Page number or 'pageSize' is the callback for changing the page number and the number of pages per page
events.description_zh: 页码或 `pageSize` 改变的回调，参数是改变后的页码及每页条数
